

======================  V I S I O N   s D K    ======================


This Folder is to contain your original asset files. ie. Files that 
are not going to be distributed with your final project.

This folder can be changed as it is not part of the project build.



Art: 

General art used in the creation of the project assets
eg. Photoshop files.




Modeling:

original Modeling files such as Max and Maya files.



Reference:

Any reference you may have used in creating project assets.
